title: Computational studies and synthesis of 131iodine-labeled nocardiotide A analogs as a peptide-based theragnostic radiopharmaceutical ligand for cancer targeting SSTR2
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10962-10968
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00684D, Paper

Rizky Juwita Sugiharti, Rani Maharani, Fransiska Kurniawan, Rahmana Emran Kartasasmita, Daryono Hadi Tjahjono
The cWIWLYA peptide shows high labeling efficiency with I-131 (>90%). Its 131I2-complex has high stability at room temperature as well as in plasma.
